headline: Has GoDaddy’s 34% 2025 Share Price Slide Created an Opportunity for Investors?
summary: If you’ve been eyeing GoDaddy and wondering whether it’s the right moment to buy, sell, or simply hold tight, you’re not alone. Investors everywhere are trying to make sense of a stock that, while down considerably this year, has a history of bouncing back. Over the past 12 months, GoDaddy’s share price has dipped by about 19.9%, and it’s had a rough start to the year with a staggering 34.3% drop year-to-date. Even in the last month, the slide continued with a 9.9% decline, and the last week...
